name: Battle of the Skies (itch)
description:
Welcome to "Battle of the Skies!" Here, two pilots will take part in a dogfight to see who is the more superior archaeologist; either the secret agent Agent Hotman, or his rival Besthalostnyy Provodnikk.

Player 1 Controls:

W to move forward

A and S to move left and right

F to fire

Player 2 Controls:

Up arrow to move forward

Left and right arrows to move left and right

J to fire
